| Property    | Attribute    | Description | Type                                                                                                             | Default                   |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| `ariaLabel` | `aria-label` |             | `string`                                                                                                         | `undefined`               |
| `as`        | `as`         |             | `BUTTON_TYPE.BUTTON \| BUTTON_TYPE.LINK`                                                                         | `BUTTON_TYPE.BUTTON`      |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`   |             | `boolean`                                                                                                        | `false`                   |
| `href`      | `href`       |             | `string`                                                                                                         | `undefined`               |
| `size`      | `size`       |             | `BUTTON_SIZES.LG \| BUTTON_SIZES.MD \| BUTTON_SIZES.SM`                                                          | `BUTTON_SIZES.MD`         |
| `target`    | `target`     |             | `"_blank" \| "_parent" \| "_self" \| "_top"`                                                                     | `'_self'`                 |
| `type`      | `type`       |             | `"button" \| "reset" \| "submit"`                                                                                | `'submit'`                |
| `variant`   | `variant`    |             | `BUTTON_VARIANTS.PRIMARY \| BUTTON_VARIANTS.QUATERNARY \| BUTTON_VARIANTS.SECONDARY \| BUTTON_VARIANTS.TERTIARY` | `BUTTON_VARIANTS.PRIMARY` |
